title: F/S T210 Dugey Series 3 Old Mill
author: Nashvol

posts.post_title: F/S T210 Dugey Series 3 Old Mill
posts.post_content: Selling my 1910 Old Mill Series 3 T210 Dugey. See scans (not edited).  Would like to get $80.00 but all reasonable offers considered. I'll pay shipping. Payment via Paypal friend/family
